pageTitle: Meeting Rooms Toronto | Event Venue | Four Seasons Hotel Toronto
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {42953=Invite your group to one of the year’s hottest tickets: premium seats to an international movie premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF) in September and VIP access to an exclusive A-list after-party. During the rest of the year, we can give your product launch the celebrity treatment at TIFF headquarters. We’ll arrange for your group to get glammed and styled and whisk you to the TIFF Bell Lightbox in a stretch limo. Walk the red carpet as the paparazzi snap pictures and enjoy a behind-the-scenes tour before you’re ushered into a private screening. Afterwards, an ultra-chic party beckons., 204759=Nov 15, 2015 - Mar 31, 2016, 5059=Built as a communications and observation tower, Toronto’s CN Tower stood as the world’s tallest free-standing structure from 1976 to 2010. It’s still the tallest in the Western hemisphere., 204701=Jul 1, 2015 - Sep 8, 2015}
textBeforeTable: --> DEV NOTE: start Property Destination weather DEV NOTE: end Property Destination Activities DEV NOTE: start Property Destination Activities DEV NOTE: end Property Food & Beverage Activities Experience the rugged landscape, sandy beaches and natural beauty of Muskoka with an afternoon lunch at a luxurious private cottage. We’ll arrange to fly your group to a pristine Muskoka lake on a floatplane (a one-hour journey by air) where a Four Seasons Chef awaits to prepare a feast of gourmet Canadian fare. Do Lunch in the Great White North A day-trip Journey to Ontario’s wine country with a Four Seasons Sommelier as your group’s knowledgeable companion. Tour the region’s boutique wineries to sample award-winning wines and create your own private label together. Back at the Hotel, a Four Seasons Executive Chef will create a menu that pairs perfectly with your special vintage for the ultimate culinary experience. textAfterTable: WEATHER Because of its southern location and proximity to Lake Ontario, Toronto enjoys warmer summers and milder winters than many other Canadian cities. Toronto experiences four distinct seasons with ample sunshine in each. With 1,300 m2 (14,300 square feet) of dedicated function space on the third and sixth floors, Four Seasons Hotel Toronto offers a wide range of flexible settings for business and social occasions.
